contentList.content:
Locusts deal [1] to characters in a cone and set Decaying.

The locusts remove Rested and Wet from all characters, and clear surfaces in their wake.

Characters with Decaying take physical damage from healing spells and potions.

Sharp bones impale enemies in the area, dealing [1] and setting Bleeding.

Sets Crippled, preventing movement.

Destroy [1] on all enemies in a cone and Transfix them, preventing them from taking action.

Upon expiry, the target will gain immunity to Terrified and Transfixed for 1 turn.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has no Magic Armour or if this skill destroys it, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Although this encounter has been brief, I am sure our paths will cross again. Tread carefully.
This world is truly a dark place. I practise Necromancy to bring back innocents slain by the tyranny of war. However, like me, they are never truly themselves again...
Can't attack, cast or interact with objects.
Character is paralysed with fear and is unable to perform actions.
Character is immune to the <font color='#C7A758'>Terrified</font> and <font color='#C7A758'>Transfixed</font> statuses.

Launch 3 bolts of arcane energy towards targets, each destroying [1] on characters.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has no Magic Armour or if this skill destroys it, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Sacrifice 15% current Vitality ([2] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Launch 3 bloodballs towards targets, each dealing [1] and creating a Blood surface.

Hurl a wicked concoction, destroying [1] and transforming enemy characters into a harmless frog for 1 turn.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has no Magic Armour or if this skill destroys it, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
|Electric bolt falls from the sky, dealing [1] damage to characters and items in the area. Sets status Shocked, which reduces Turn AP by 1.|

Sacrifice 5% current Vitality ([1] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Call a terrible downpour, creating Blood surfaces which spread and douse flames.

Sets Bleeding and Decaying on all characters.
Gain [1] and an additional [1] for each <font color='#797980'>corpse</font> in the area around you.
Explode, destroying yourself to deal [1] to all nearby characters.
Corpses around you explode and totems with ranged damage spawn next to them.

Sacrifice 5% current Vitality ([1] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Strike your flesh, creating a Blood surface and causing you to Bleed.

You are also cleansed of Diseased, Poisoned, Decaying, and Infected.

Gain Blood Armour for 2 turns.

Each time you sacrifice Vitality to cast a spell, you restore Physical Armour equal to the sacrifice percentage.

Empower all nearby allied Undead Summons, increasing their Vitality by [1]% and Movement Speed by [2]%.

This skill also removes Knocked Down, Stunned, and Frozen.

Sacrifice 20% current Vitality ([2] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Deal [1] to enemies around you and setting Bleeding.

Transforms all Water surfaces into their Blood counterpart.

Restores Vitality equal to [3]% of the damage dealt to each character.

Destroy [1] on all enemies around you. Terrifies hit characters, causing them to cower and flee.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has no Magic Armour or if this skill destroys it, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Gain Reanimator, causing you to raise a Totemic Zombie whenever you kill a non-allied character.

The Zombie lasts for up to 2 turns.

Gain Overlord, increasing your Summon Count to [1] at the cost of [2] Constitution.

Whilst affected by Overlord, conjured Summons have [3]AP and deal [4]% Damage for the duration of Overlord.

Upon expiry previous Summons will disintegrate. Conjuring a Non-Undead Summon will remove the Overlord status.

Totemic Summons do not count towards the effects of Overlord.

Sacrifice 25% current Vitality ([2] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Conjure a volatile bloodstorm over target area, lasting 2 turns.

Blood crashes from the bloodstorm on-cast and on-turn at up to 5 enemies, dealing [1] in a 2m radius.

Applies Decaying and Diseased.
Raise a walking pile of bones. It can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking Damage buff.
Raise a walking pile of bones. It can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking Damage buff.

Deadly shrooms blight the area, destroying [1] and creating a Cursed Smoke Cloud which Suffocates and Blinds characters.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has no Magic Armour or if this skill destroys it, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Raise target intact corpse as a Bloated Corpse. The Bloated Corpse lasts 5 turns and is deceptively volatile.

At 10 Summoning, the Bloated Corpse increases in size, gains additional stats, and explodes in a larger radius.
Target character consumes <font color="#c80030">Blood surfaces</font> around them, restoring <font color="#97fbff">Vitality</font> based on the surface consumed this way.

Target character gains Death Resist, preventing their Vitality falling below 1HP.

If the target is a Summon, their lifetime is extended for the duration of Death Resist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Certain environmental damage ignores Death Resist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Target <font color='#88a25b'>ally</font> sacrifices <font color='#B823CB'>10%</font> of their <font color='#B823CB'>current Vitality</font> to gain a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their <font color='#C80030'>missing Vitality</font>.

Target and Decay a nearby character, dealing [1].

Characters with Decaying take physical damage from healing spells and potions.

Range: [1]
Decay makes healing spells and potions do damage on target.

Undead hands arise from Blood and Blood Cloud surfaces, dealing [1] to enemies.

Targets also become Crippled, preventing movement.

Deal [1] and Infect the target, reducing Constitution by [2] and Damage by [3]%.

The Infected applies Diseased to their allied characters without Physical Armour within 5m, applying the same debuffs.

Unleash a swarm of mosquitos unto the target, dealing [1] and setting Bleeding.

Restores Vitality equal to [2]% of the damage dealt.
Afflict <font color='#7F00FF'>Arcane Punishment</font> onto the target, causing them to take [1] whenever they cast a skill.

Temporarily removes all Magic Armour from the target.

At the end of the current turn, the target's Magic Armour returns to its original amount.

Destroy target allied Undead Summon to immediately gain 1AP.

Resets the cooldown of Unearth Corpse.

Destroy [1] and Silence the target, preventing them from casting spells.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has no Magic Armour or if this skill destroys it, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Accurse the target, reducing their <font color='#C80030'>Elemental Resistances by [1]%</font>.
Embue target character, increasing their <font color='#40B606'>Damage by [1]%</font>.

Raise target intact corpse as a Bone Golem. The Bone Golem lasts 5 turns and is a durable brute who can unearth corpses.

At 10 Summoning, the Bone Golem gains additional stats.

Raise target intact corpse as a Bone Widow. The Bone Widow lasts 5 turns and is a bulky hard-hitter despite being susceptible to magic attacks.

At 10 Summoning, the Bone Widow increases in size and gains additional stats.

Raise target intact corpse as an Undead Assassin. The Undead Assassin lasts 5 turns and is a cunning and deadly executioner.

At 10 Summoning, the Undead Assassin gains additional stats.

Raise target intact corpse as an Undead Elementalist. The Undead Elementalist lasts 5 turns and is a versatile mage.

At 10 Summoning, the Undead Elementalist gains additional stats.

Raise target intact corpse as an Undead Warrior. The Undead Warrior lasts 5 turns and is a close-quarters bruiser.

At 10 Summoning, the Undead Warrior gains additional stats.

Sacrifice 15% current Vitality ([2] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Unleash a torrent of blood, dealing [1] to characters in the area and creating a Blood surface.

Repurpose each corpse within the target area into a Bone Totem.

Bone Totems are Totemic Summons, each lasting for 4 turns.

Sacrifice 10% current Vitality ([2] Vitality) to cast this spell.

Submerge into a Blood Pool and emerge at the target Blood Pool.

Unearths a corpse at your original position. The corpse expires after 2 turns.
Unearth a <font color='#797980'>fresh corpse</font> at target location. The <font color='#797980'>corpse</font> expires after 2 turns.

Tether to target character without Physical Armour, causing them to receive any damage you receive.

This damage ignores any resistances the target has.
Suffer [1] to resurrect target <font color='#88a25b'>ally</font> to <font color="#97fbff">100% Vitality</font>.
|Line of intense heat that deals [1] damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind.|
